One movie that could be enjoyed by you is "The Old Man and the Sea" released in 1952. The movie stars Burt Reynolds and John Sargeant, who play a fisherman named Santiago and his apprentice, Manolin.

The story follows Santiago's journey to sea after not landing any fish for over three years. During his journey, he encounters a whale that attacks him, causing him to lose one of his arms.

Despite his physical injuries, Santiago continues on his journey to sea. During his final voyage, he catches an enormous fish that drags him out to sea.

Santiago manages to keep hold of his fishing pole, but the immense weight of the fish drags Santiago out to sea.

During his journey in the ocean, Santiago encounters other sea creatures such as dolphins and sea turtles.

Despite encountering these other sea creatures during his journey in the ocean, Santiago remains focused on his goal: to catch the enormous fish that he encountered earlier on in his journey in the ocean.

The movie "The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones" is directed by Mark Waters. The film received mixed reviews from critics but was a box office success, grossing over $62 million worldwide.
The movie "The Relic" is an adventure film based on the best-selling young adult novel series "The Mortal Instruments". The movie stars Tracie Thoms as Clary Fray, Tracie Thoms as Jace Herondale, Paul Dano as Simon Greasewell and Piper Perabo as Esme Carlings.
The movie "The Nanny" is an adventure film based on the best-selling young adult novel series "The Mortal Instruments". The movie stars Piper Perabo as Magsie, Tracie Thoms as Clary Fray, Tracie Thoms as Jace Herondale, Paul Dano as Simon Greasewell and Piper Perabo as Esme Carlings.
The movie "The Nanny" is directed by Peter Solberg. The film received mixed reviews from critics but was a box office success, grossing over $32 million worldwide.
The movie "Looper" is an adventure film based on the best-selling young adult novel series "The Mortal Instruments". The movie stars Joseph Gordon-Levitt as Joe Cooper, Tracie Thoms as Clary Fray, Tracie Thoms as Jace Herondale, Paul Dano as Simon Greasewell and Piper Perabo as Esme Carlings.
The movie "Looper" is directed by Rian Johnson. The film received mixed reviews from critics but was a box office success, grossing over $89 million worldwide.
